content.rendered:
STEDI Universal Rocker Switches for cabin use with a large variety of prints to relevant devices around your vehicle.

OVERVIEW

Suited to fit all vehicles with holder dimensions of 36.83mm x 21mm. Available in 21 variants of print from light related to accessories and auxiliary throughout your vehicle.

OPERATION

Simple On/Off function with dash & power illumination, text lighting up whilst the vehicles dash lights are active and icon when the chosen device is currently active. Blue backlit illumination.

OEM FITMENT

Complete OEM fitment with a clean finish to maintain the factory look to the inside of the cabin. Included diagram for quick & easy installation.

DETAILS

Switch surface size is 49mm x 25mm and uses a standard din size mounting hole of 36mm x 22mm, which is the standard size in most vehicles. Please ensure you check these measurements to ensure correct fitment.

Please select your required print using the drop down box.

  • Single Pole Single Throw ON – OFF switch
  • Winch IN Winch Out is a 3 Stage Switch
  • Robust design
  • Upper backlight light is ON when the switch is pressed UP.
  • Lower backlight can be wired to your dash light circuit for constant backlight to switch
  • Waterproof rating of IP66.
  • Same size as the switches sold at well-known 4×4 store
  • Rated 20A 12V / 24v 10
  • Wiring diagram supplied with switch.
  • Cutout dimensions 21mm x 36.83mmWhilst our rocket switches are 20amp rated, we strongly recommend that power is run via inline fuse.All graphic and text are printed on switch face using state of the inks to ensure long life. Unlike imitation switches that use stickers prone to wear.

SPECIFICATIONS

BACK LIGHT COLOUR Blue
CUTOUT DIMENSIONS 21mm x 36.83mm
RATED 20A 12v / 10A 24v
SWITCH DIMENSION 49mm x 25mm

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Rocker Switch F
  • Wiring Diagram

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI CARLING TYPE ROCKER SWITCHES

From $17.99 To $29.99

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
